Text: Breed group (dog):  In dogs, kennel clubs define the "Breed Groups" and decide which dog breeds are to be included in each breed group.

Text: Breed group (dog):  The Fédération Cynologique Internationale breed groups are used to organize dogs for international competition.

Text: Breed group (dog):  Breed groups often have the names of, and are loosely based on, ancestral dog types of modern dog breeds.
